snippet.title: Mind Scanners Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Mind Scanners now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389550/Mind_Scanners/

Mind Scanners is a retro-futuristic management game in which you diagnose the citizens of a dystopian metropolis. Locate a host of other-worldly characters and use arcade-style treatment devices to help them.

Huge thank you to Offermose for the trailer music (track: Bag de Hvide Tinder - 2016).
Listen to more Offermose: http://offermose.bandcamp.com

Developed by The Outer Zone
Published by Brave At Night

Supported by Danish Film Institute, Danish Arts Foundation, KodaKultur
#indiegame #MindScanners
